name: Runescape 3 - C++ Client
description:
Release March 20th 2020:
- Version: 1.0.0
- Author: DaDavinci
- Branch: Testing
- Client: NXT (C++)

# Note: Testing how to write Installer for Runescape 3 NXT Client.
notes: I'm not responsible for damage to your wine or lutris installation by using this version. This version is for test purposes only.
content:
files:
- file1: https://content.runescape.com/l=6/downloads/windows/RuneScape-Setup.exe
- file2: N/A:Select the game's setup file
- unredistribuable_file: N/A
game:
  custom-name: RuneScape 3
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Jagex/Runescape Launcher/RuneScape.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Jagex/Runescape Launcher/RuneScape-Setup.exe
    src: file1
